entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
